mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.gcontest_hots_id AS "gcontestHotsId", a.keyword AS "keyword", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
